the timestamp formatted as MMM dd yyyy HH:mm:ss

the application protocol

the source IP address

the name of the profile or module
the length of the upstream data
the length of the downstream data
the SHA-1 digest of the pcap file

whether the alert detail regards an upstream or downstream message
